dr.geo.distributions
Class HyperSphereDistribution

java.lang.Object
  dr.geo.distributions.HyperSphereDistribution
All Implemented Interfaces:
MultivariateDistribution
Direct Known Subclasses:
FisherBinghamKentDistribution, VonMisesDistribution, VonMisesFisherDistribution
public abstract class HyperSphereDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
implements MultivariateDistribution

Author:
Marc Suchard Abstract base class for probability distributions on a hyper-sphere S^{d-1} in R^{d}. Usual cases are: circle (d=2) and sphere (d=3)
